# I hope this works
```{r, eval=TRUE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

Verify that your data looks like this:

```{r, eval=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
glimpse(house_elections)
glimpse(candidates)
glimpse(committees)
glimpse(contributions)
```

> Make sure that the row and column counts match!
